summary: A documentary that details the creation of Julian Assange's controversial website, which facilitated the largest security breach in U.S. history.

Crowley|Mark Davis|Ken Day|Kevin Lee Poulsen|Nick Davies|Iain Overton|James Ball|Gavin MacFadyen|Donald Boström|Anna Ardin|Vaughan Smith|Helena Kennedy|Hillary Clinton|Rafael Correa|Katie Couric|Rahm Emanuel|Tom Flanagan|Robert Gates|Newt Gingrich|Lindsey Graham|Mike Huckabee|Bill Keller|Mitch McConnell|Candice Miller|Michael Moore|Goff Morrell|Mike Mullen|Bill O'Reilly|Barack Obama|Ron Paul|Diane Sawyer|Mark Stephens|Jake Tapper
title: We Steal Secrets: La historia de WikiLeaks
